version2.prototype.summary.temporal

Interface TemporalSummaryCompositionStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CDCWeeklyStrategy, GregorianMonthlyStrategy, GregorianWeeklyStrategy, WHOWeeklyStrategy

    public interface TemporalSummaryCompositionStrategy
    Interface designed for defining temporal summary composition strategies (methods by which to combine the raster files to create temporal composites).
    Author:
    michael.devos

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDaysInOneComposite(java.util.GregorianCalendar dateInComposite)
      Returns the number of days in a single composition of data for this calendar.
      java.util.GregorianCalendar getStartDate(java.util.GregorianCalendar sDate)
      Returns the date of the first day in the period the given date belongs to.

    • Method Detail

      • getDaysInOneComposite

        int getDaysInOneComposite(java.util.GregorianCalendar dateInComposite)
        Returns the number of days in a single composition of data for this calendar. E.G. A CalendarStrategy using weeks will return 7 here.
        Parameters:
        dateInComposite - - date to which to check composition size for
        Returns:
        number of days in the checked composite

      • getStartDate

        java.util.GregorianCalendar getStartDate(java.util.GregorianCalendar sDate)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the date of the first day in the period the given date belongs to. I.E. The first day of a week a date falls in.
        Parameters:
        sDate - - start date for this composite
        Returns:
        Calendar - The first day of the containing time period.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
